title: Staff Data Scientist, Ad Measurement Products
location: San Francisco, CA, US; Remote, US

title: Engineering Manager - Consumer
description:
The Remember Me - Consumer team is building Plaid’s next generation of direct-to-consumer products. Our mission is to help people feel more confident and secure in managing their financial lives through intuitive, high-trust experiences powered by Plaid’s network.

This team is developing a new consumer-facing security and bank account monitoring product focused on proactive fraud detection and financial account visibility. It represents an important step in expanding Plaid’s direct-to-consumer offerings. We are a small, fast-moving team focused on 0→1 development, owning the experience end-to-end from backend systems to user-facing flows.

As the TLM for the Consumer team, you will split your time between hands-on technical leadership and people management.

You will be accountable for the technical foundation of the product, leading the design and evolution of systems that monitor financial accounts and power user-facing experiences. You will drive key architectural decisions, raise engineering standards through design reviews and mentorship, and help the team balance rapid iteration with long-term system health.

At the same time, you will build and lead a strong engineering team. You will create clarity around goals, support individual growth, and hold a high bar for ownership and delivery. You will work closely with Product and Design to take complex, ambiguous problems and turn them into simple, trustworthy experiences for users.
